description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任辽宁省人民政府副省长、沈阳市人民政府市长。因犯受贿罪和巨额财产来源不明罪，于2001年被判处死刑缓期二年执行，2002年因癌症病故。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Governor of Liaoning Province and Mayor of Shenyang Municipal People's Government. He was sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve in 2001 for bribery and holding a huge amount of property with unidentified sources, and died of cancer in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 慕绥新的第一任妻子。
description.en: The first wife of Mu Suixin.

description.zh-cn: 慕绥新的第二任妻子。
description.en: The second wife of Mu Suixin.

description.zh-cn: 慕绥新的长女。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Mu Suixin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国陕西省榆林市下辖县，是慕绥新的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Yulin City, Shaanxi Province, People's Republic of China. It is the birthplace of Mu Suixin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省下辖的副省级市，是慕绥新的逝世地。
description.en: A sub-provincial city under the jurisdiction of Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China. It is the place where Mu Suixin passed away.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国陕西省榆林市下辖县，是慕绥新的籍贯地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Yulin City, Shaanxi Province, People's Republic of China. It is the ancestral home of Mu Suixin.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名高等学府，慕绥新的母校。
description.en: A famous institution of higher learning in China, the alma mater of Mu Suixin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国沈阳市的市级国家行政机关。
description.en: The municipal-level state administrative organ of Shenyang City, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在沈阳市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Shenyang City.

nodes.id: 辽宁省大连市中级人民法院

zh-cn: 辽宁省大连市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 位于中国辽宁省大连市的司法审判机关，该法院一审判处慕绥新死刑缓期执行。
description.en: A judicial trial organ located in Dalian City, Liaoning Province, China. This court sentenced Mu Suixin to death with a reprieve in the first instance.

description.zh-cn: 一种刑事罪名，指国家工作人员利用职务上的便利，索取他人财物，或者非法收受他人财物，为他人谋取利益的行为。
description.en: A criminal offense where a state functionary takes advantage of their position to demand or illegally accept property from others in exchange for providing benefits.

description.zh-cn: 一种刑事罪名，指国家工作人员的财产或者支出明显超过合法收入，差额巨大，本人不能说明其来源是合法的行为。
description.en: A criminal offense where a state functionary's assets or expenditures significantly exceed their lawful income, and they cannot account for the source of the vast difference.

description.zh-cn: 一组以失控的细胞生长为特征的疾病，慕绥新因患此病去世。
description.en: A group of diseases characterized by uncontrolled cell growth. Mu Suixin died from this disease.

description.zh-cn: 原沈阳市副市长，因腐败问题被调查，其案件是慕马案的开端并牵涉出慕绥新。
description.en: Former deputy mayor of Shenyang, who was investigated for corruption. His case initiated the Mu-Ma case and implicated Mu Suixin.

description.zh-cn: 指原沈阳市市长慕绥新和原沈阳市常务副市长马向东等人的重大贪污受贿系列案件。
description.en: Refers to the major series of corruption and bribery cases involving former Shenyang mayor Mu Suixin and former executive deputy mayor Ma Xiangdong.

nodes.id: 中共中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中共中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的纪律检查机关，负责对党员和党组织进行监督，查处违纪行为。
description.en: The disciplinary inspection body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, responsible for supervising party members and organizations and investigating disciplinary violations.

description.zh-cn: 慕绥新长女慕洋的公公，因涉嫌转移慕绥新案赃款被通缉并抓获。
description.en: The father-in-law of Mu Suixin's eldest daughter, Mu Yang. He was wanted and arrested for allegedly transferring illicit funds from Mu Suixin's case.

description.zh-cn: 慕绥新长女慕洋的婆婆，因涉嫌转移慕绥新案赃款被通缉并抓获。
description.en: The mother-in-law of Mu Suixin's eldest daughter, Mu Yang. She was wanted and arrested for allegedly transferring illicit funds from Mu Suixin's case.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主管全国公安工作的国务院组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for national public security.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省下辖的地级市，是李琦、罗桂芝夫妇被抓获的地点。
description.en: A prefecture-level city under the jurisdiction of Zhejiang Province, People's Republic of China. It is the location where Li Qi and Luo Guizhi were captured.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，慕绥新的前任沈阳市市长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, predecessor of Mu Suixin as Mayor of Shenyang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，慕绥新的继任沈阳市市长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, successor of Mu Suixin as Mayor of Shenyang.

description.zh-cn: 辽宁省历史上的一个县，慕绥新曾在此任职。
description.en: A historical county in Liaoning Province where Mu Suixin once held office.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省鞍山市代管的县级市，慕绥新曾在此任职。
description.en: A county-level city in Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China, administered by Anshan. Mu Suixin once served as its mayor.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省下辖的地级市，慕绥新曾在此任职。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China, where Mu Suixin once held office.

description.zh-cn: 慕绥新与贾桂娥于1970年代结婚，于1999年4月离婚。
description.en: Mu Suixin married Jia Gui'e in the 1970s and they divorced in April 1999.

description.zh-cn: 慕绥新于1999年5月与平晓芳结婚，该段婚姻因慕绥新于2002年病故而结束。
description.en: Mu Suixin married Ping Xiaofang in May 1999; the marriage ended with Mu Suixin's death in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 慕洋是慕绥新的长女。
description.en: Mu Yang is the eldest daughter of Mu Suixin.

description.zh-cn: 慕绥新于1943年10月出生于陕西省绥德县。
description.en: Mu Suixin was born in Suide County, Shaanxi Province in October 1943.

degree.zh-cn: 电子工程系电机制造专业
degree.en: Motor Manufacturing, Department of Electrical Engineering

description.zh-cn: 慕绥新于1970年毕业于清华大学电子工程系电机制造专业。
description.en: Mu Suixin graduated from Tsinghua University in 1970, majoring in Motor Manufacturing in the Department of Electrical Engineering.

description.zh-cn: 慕绥新于1978年加入中国共产党，后因贪腐问题被开除党籍。
description.en: Mu Suixin joined the Communist Party of China in 1978 and was later expelled due to corruption issues.

description.zh-cn: 自1988年起在辽宁省人民政府任职，历任省体改委副主任、劳动局副局长、劳动局局长、建设厅厅长、省长助理，并于1996年升任副省长。
description.en: Starting in 1988, he held various positions in the Liaoning Provincial People's Government, including Deputy Director of the Provincial Commission for Restructuring the Economic System, Deputy Director and Director of the Labor Bureau, Director of the Construction Department, and Assistant to the Governor, before being promoted to Vice Governor in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 慕绥新于1996年12月起兼任中共沈阳市委副书记。
description.en: Mu Suixin concurrently served as Deputy Secretary of the CPC Shenyang Municipal Committee starting in December 1996.

description.zh-cn: 慕绥新于1997年2月至2000年12月担任沈阳市市长。
description.en: Mu Suixin served as Mayor of Shenyang from February 1997 to December 2000.

relationships.source: 辽宁省大连市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 于2001年10月10日一审以受贿罪和巨额财产来源不明罪判处慕绥新死刑，缓期二年执行。
description.en: On October 10, 2001, the court sentenced Mu Suixin to death with a two-year reprieve in the first instance for the crimes of bribery and holding a huge amount of property with unidentified sources.

description.zh-cn: 慕绥新于2000年5月被诊断出肺癌，并最终于2002年3月2日因此病故。
description.en: Mu Suixin was diagnosed with lung cancer in May 2000 and eventually passed away from the disease on March 2, 2002.

description.zh-cn: 因卷入慕马案，慕绥新于2001年3月被立案调查并采取“双规”措施，最终导致其被判刑。
description.en: Due to his involvement in the Mu-Ma case, Mu Suixin was placed under investigation and subjected to "shuanggui" measures in March 2001, which ultimately led to his conviction.

relationships.source: 中共中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 1999年7月，中共中央纪委成立专案组，开始对马向东等人进行调查，该调查最终发展为“慕马案”。
description.en: In July 1999, the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection established a special task force to investigate Ma Xiangdong and others, an investigation that eventually developed into the "Mu-Ma case".

description.zh-cn: 李琦是慕绥新长女慕洋的公公。
description.en: Li Qi is the father-in-law of Mu Suixin's eldest daughter, Mu Yang.

description.zh-cn: 罗桂芝是慕绥新长女慕洋的婆婆。
description.en: Luo Guizhi is the mother-in-law of Mu Suixin's eldest daughter, Mu Yang.

description.zh-cn: 2002年9月25日，公安部在浙江省金华市将因转移赃款被通缉的李琦抓获。
description.en: On September 25, 2002, the Ministry of Public Security captured Li Qi, who was wanted for transferring illicit funds, in Jinhua City, Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 2002年9月25日，公安部在浙江省金华市将因转移赃款被通缉的罗桂芝抓获。
description.en: On September 25, 2002, the Ministry of Public Security captured Luo Guizhi, who was wanted for transferring illicit funds, in Jinhua City, Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 1997年2月，慕绥新接替张荣茂担任沈阳市市长。
description.en: In February 1997, Mu Suixin succeeded Zhang Rongmao as Mayor of Shenyang.

description.zh-cn: 2000年12月，陈政高接替慕绥新担任沈阳市市长。
description.en: In December 2000, Chen Zhenggao succeeded Mu Suixin as Mayor of Shenyang.
